scripts.posttest: npm run report:merge && npm run report:generate && npm run report:sync-docs
scripts.posttest:core: npm run report:merge && npm run report:generate && npm run report:sync-docs
scripts.posttest:features: npm run report:merge && npm run report:generate && npm run report:sync-docs
scripts.report:generate-timestamped: node -e "const now = new Date(); const year = now.getFullYear(); const month = String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0'); const day = String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0'); const hours = String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0'); const minutes = String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0'); const seconds = String(now.getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0'); const date = year + '-' + month + '-' + day; const time = hours + '-' + minutes + '-' + seconds; require('fs').mkdirSync('cypress/reports/' + date, { recursive: true }); require('child_process').execSync('marge cypress/reports/report.json --reportDir cypress/reports/' + date + ' --assetsDir cypress/reports/' + date + '/assets --reportFilename report-' + date + 'T' + time + '.html'); const reportPath = 'cypress/reports/' + date + '/report-' + date + 'T' + time + '.html'; console.log('Reporte generado: ' + reportPath);"
scripts.clean-reports: if exist cypress\reports\mocha\*.json del cypress\reports\mocha\*.json && if exist cypress\reports\report.json del cypress\reports\report.json
